dateRangeParam.name: date_range
dateRangeParam.help: "select the earliest and latest dates to include for computing mosquito counts."

filterParamNew.name: households_nf
filterParamNew.help: Select participants based on their characteristics.

filterParamNew.name: geographic_region
filterParamNew.help: Select dwellngs based on geographic region.

filterParamNew.name: participants_nf
filterParamNew.help: Select participants based on their characteristics.

datasetParam.name: householdsBySourceID
datasetParam.help:
Input a set of source ID's, or upload a file

It can be delimited by a comma, semi colon or any white space

Its possible that not all ID's in the list will be found in the database due to a number of reasons such as unavailable ID maping. Its also currently not possible to inform which ID's did not match anything in the database

enumParam.name: district
enumParam.help: Choose the study sites (districts) for your search.

sqlQuery.name: HouseholdOntology
sqlQuery.sql: with leaf as ( select o.ontology_term_name, CASE WHEN o.parent_ontology_term_name = 'Thing' THEN null ELSE o.parent_ontology_term_name END as parent_ontology_term_name, nvl(o.display_name,o.ontology_term_name) as display_name, o.description, o.units,o.type,o.is_range,o.precision from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$Ontology o, (select distinct term from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$MetaData where dataset_name = 'ISASimple_ICEMR_PRISM_surveillance_RSRC' --$$dataset$$ and category = 'Household type') md where o.ontology_term_name = md.term), first as ( select o.ontology_term_name, CASE WHEN o.parent_ontology_term_name = 'Thing' THEN null ELSE o.parent_ontology_term_name END as parent_ontology_term_name, nvl(o.display_name,o.ontology_term_name) as display_name, o.description, o.units,o.type,o.is_range,o.precision from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$Ontology o, (select distinct parent_ontology_term_name from leaf where parent_ontology_term_name is not null) par where o.ontology_term_name = par.parent_ontology_term_name), second as ( select o.ontology_term_name, CASE WHEN o.parent_ontology_term_name = 'Thing' THEN null ELSE o.parent_ontology_term_name END as parent_ontology_term_name, nvl(o.display_name,o.ontology_term_name) as display_name, o.description, o.units,o.type,o.is_range,o.precision from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$Ontology o, (select distinct parent_ontology_term_name from first where parent_ontology_term_name is not null) gpar where o.ontology_term_name = gpar.parent_ontology_term_name) select * from leaf union select * from first union select * from second union select o.ontology_term_name, CASE WHEN o.parent_ontology_term_name = 'Thing' THEN null ELSE o.parent_ontology_term_name END as parent_ontology_term_name, nvl(o.display_name,o.ontology_term_name) as display_name, o.description, o.units,o.type,o.is_range,o.precision from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$Ontology o, (select distinct parent_ontology_term_name from second where parent_ontology_term_name is not null) ggpar where o.ontology_term_name = ggpar.parent_ontology_term_name union select 'average anopheles' as ontology_term_name, null as parent_ontology_term_name, 'Average Anopheles Collected' as display_name, 'Average number of Anopheles collected in monthly CDC light traps during the dates of this search' as description, null as units, 'number' as type, 1 as is_range, null as precision from dual

sqlQuery.name: HouseholdMetaDataBkgd
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct m.pan_id as internal, term as ontology_term_name, string_value, number_value, date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$MetaData m where m.dataset_name = $$dataset$$ and m.category = 'Household type' union select da.pan_id, 'average anopheles' as ontology_term_name, null as string_value, round(avg(nvl(EUPATH_0000192,0)+nvl(EUPATH_0000193,0)+nvl(EUPATH_0000204,0)+nvl(EUPATH_0000205,0)),1) as number_value, null as date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$Households da, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$PANIO io, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$LightTraps la where da.pan_id = io.input_pan_id and la.pan_id = io.output_pan_id group by da.pan_id

sqlQuery.name: HouseholdMetaData
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct m.pan_id as internal, term as ontology_term_name, string_value, number_value, date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$MetaData m where m.pan_id in ($$geographic_region$$) union select da.pan_id, 'average anopheles' as ontology_term_name, null as string_value, round(avg(nvl(EUPATH_0000192,0)+nvl(EUPATH_0000193,0)+nvl(EUPATH_0000204,0)+nvl(EUPATH_0000205,0)),1) as number_value, null as date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$Households da, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$PANIO io, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$LightTraps la where da.pan_id in ($$geographic_region$$) and da.pan_id = io.input_pan_id and la.pan_id = io.output_pan_id and la.OBI_0001619 >= $$date_range.min$$ and la.OBI_0001619 <= $$date_range.max$$ group by da.pan_id

sqlQuery.name: RegionOntology
sqlQuery.sql: select o.ontology_term_name, 'dummy' as parent_ontology_term_name, o.display_name, o.description, o.units,o.type,o.is_range,o.precision from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$Ontology o, (select distinct source_id from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$MetaData where dataset_name = 'ISASimple_ICEMR_PRISM_surveillance_RSRC' --$$dataset$$ and source_id in ('EUPATH_0000054','OBI_0001627','EUPATH_0000452') and category = 'Household type') ds where ds.source_id = o.ontology_term_source_id union select 'dummy' as ontology_term_name, null as parent_ontology_term_name, 'Household' as display_name, null as description, null as units, 'string' as type, 0 as is_range, null as precision from dual

sqlQuery.name: RegionMetaData
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct pan_id as internal, term as ontology_term_name, string_value, number_value, date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$MetaData where dataset_name = $$dataset$$ and category in ('Household type','Household') and source_id in ('EUPATH_0000054','OBI_0001627','EUPATH_0000452')

sqlQuery.name: ParticipantOntology
sqlQuery.sql: with leaf as ( select o.ontology_term_name, CASE WHEN o.parent_ontology_term_name = 'Thing' THEN null ELSE o.parent_ontology_term_name END as parent_ontology_term_name, nvl(o.display_name,o.ontology_term_name) as display_name, o.description, o.units,o.type,o.is_range,o.precision from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$Ontology o, (select distinct term from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$MetaData where dataset_name = 'ISASimple_ICEMR_PRISM_surveillance_RSRC' --$$dataset$$ and category = 'Child') md where o.ontology_term_name = md.term), first as ( select o.ontology_term_name, CASE WHEN o.parent_ontology_term_name = 'Thing' THEN null ELSE o.parent_ontology_term_name END as parent_ontology_term_name, nvl(o.display_name,o.ontology_term_name) as display_name, o.description, o.units,o.type,o.is_range,o.precision from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$Ontology o, (select distinct parent_ontology_term_name from leaf where parent_ontology_term_name is not null) par where o.ontology_term_name = par.parent_ontology_term_name), second as ( select o.ontology_term_name, CASE WHEN o.parent_ontology_term_name = 'Thing' THEN null ELSE o.parent_ontology_term_name END as parent_ontology_term_name, nvl(o.display_name,o.ontology_term_name) as display_name, o.description, o.units,o.type,o.is_range,o.precision from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$Ontology o, (select distinct parent_ontology_term_name from first where parent_ontology_term_name is not null) gpar where o.ontology_term_name = gpar.parent_ontology_term_name) select * from leaf union select * from first union select * from second union select o.ontology_term_name, CASE WHEN o.parent_ontology_term_name = 'Thing' THEN null ELSE o.parent_ontology_term_name END as parent_ontology_term_name, nvl(o.display_name,o.ontology_term_name) as display_name, o.description, o.units,o.type,o.is_range,o.precision from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$Ontology o, (select distinct parent_ontology_term_name from second where parent_ontology_term_name is not null) ggpar where o.ontology_term_name = ggpar.parent_ontology_term_name

sqlQuery.name: ParticipantMetaData
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct m.pan_id as internal, m.term as ontology_term_name, m.string_value, m.number_value, m.date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$MetaData m, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$PANIO io where m.dataset_name = $$dataset$$ and m.category = 'Child' and m.pan_id = io.output_pan_id and io.input_pan_id in ($$households_nf$$)

sqlQuery.name: ParticipantMetaDataBkgd
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct m.pan_id as internal, m.term as ontology_term_name, m.string_value, m.number_value, m.date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$MetaData m, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$PANIO io where m.dataset_name = $$dataset$$ and m.category = 'Child' and m.pan_id = io.output_pan_id and io.input_pan_id in (select pan_id from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$Households)
